rows.label: tlk006401_03_msg0001
rows.name:
It seems Lilio and the others are getting
used to it here. They're getting along
well with the people of Avaritia, too.

rows.label: tlk006401_03_msg0002
rows.name:
They're working diligently,
so it's a great help to us,
reducing our workload.

rows.label: tlk006401_03_msg0003
rows.name:
Pittman, the one whose ship was
stolen, doesn't seem to have
forgiven them yet, though...

rows.label: tlk006401_03_msg0004
rows.name:
Well, it's probably
just a matter of time.
